p: Routine use of NGS for diagnostic purposes is expected to hold great advantages over existing techniques [ 148]. For instance, the genotyping of Coronavirus virus, which has been drawing attention of epidemiologists worldwide, is already influencing decision-making in healthcare [ 149]. Additionally, genomes of drug-resistant HIV strains are used to study the evolution of the virus [ 150] and complex genotype/phenotype associations between the virus and the host [ 151, 152].
